about_the_game:
Game Introduction

Welcome to The Madness Trap Trek, a game with 8 progressively challenging stages filled with traps and puzzles that test your reflexes and skill.

The first 4 stages are designed for beginners, allowing players to get used to the game mechanics without much difficulty. You’ll breeze through these stages quickly — but don’t get too comfortable, as the real challenge begins afterwards!

From Stage 5 onwards, you’ll encounter a series of intricate and punishing traps. Surviving these and reaching the escape warp will require sharp focus and quick reflexes.

Stages 6 and 7 will push your physical abilities even further. If you have confidence in your gaming skills, you should be able to navigate through these tough trials.

And then there’s the final Stage 8: the ultimate challenge. Even the developers have yet to beat it flawlessly. This stage is packed with unexpected traps and relentless obstacles, making it the true test of your abilities.

But don’t be discouraged — it is absolutely possible to beat the game. If you can conquer this final stage and see the ending, you’ll earn the title of King of Physical Skill.

Think you’ve got what it takes? Prove it!
detailed_description:
Game Introduction

Welcome to The Madness Trap Trek, a game with 8 progressively challenging stages filled with traps and puzzles that test your reflexes and skill.

The first 4 stages are designed for beginners, allowing players to get used to the game mechanics without much difficulty. You’ll breeze through these stages quickly — but don’t get too comfortable, as the real challenge begins afterwards!

From Stage 5 onwards, you’ll encounter a series of intricate and punishing traps. Surviving these and reaching the escape warp will require sharp focus and quick reflexes.

Stages 6 and 7 will push your physical abilities even further. If you have confidence in your gaming skills, you should be able to navigate through these tough trials.

And then there’s the final Stage 8: the ultimate challenge. Even the developers have yet to beat it flawlessly. This stage is packed with unexpected traps and relentless obstacles, making it the true test of your abilities.

But don’t be discouraged — it is absolutely possible to beat the game. If you can conquer this final stage and see the ending, you’ll earn the title of King of Physical Skill.

Think you’ve got what it takes? Prove it!

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy 광기의 함정(The Madness Trap Trek)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.3 GHz or AMD FX-8350 @ 4.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680 or AMD Radeon HD 7970 (2 GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Madness Trap Trek is a thrilling escape adventure where you must dodge deadly traps and make it out of the dungeon alive. Each stage challenges you with a unique path to freedom, filled with hidden dangers that will test your reflexes and strategy.
